articles.title: 3 Billion Years Ago, a Meteorite the Size of Four Mount Everests Struck Earth – Changing Life Forever - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Massive impacts had a silver lining for life. Billions of years ago, long before life as we know it emerged, meteorites regularly bombarded the planet. Around 3.26 billion years ago, one of these space rocks struck Earth, and even today, it’s revealing secret…
articles.content: A new study reveals that a massive meteoritic impact 3.26 billion years ago both devastated and enriched Earth’s environment, allowing bacteria to thrive and offering new insights into early life on … [+4631 chars]
